messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the suggested duration for studying the Thaumaturgical Prodigies In The New-England Canaan?
40 weeks
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are some suggested spells for the Thaumaturgical Prodigies In The New-England Canaan?

Call Down Spirit (Summon/Bind Byakhee), Call Forth the Earth Spirit (Contact Ch-thonian), Contact Ghoul, Contact Hound of Tin-dalos, Contact Deity/Nyarlathotep, Door to Kadath (a Gate to Kadath), Restore Life (Resurrection).
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Mythos Rating of the Thaumaturgical Prodigies In The New-England Canaan?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Cthulhu Mythos bonus to the Thaumaturgical Prodigies In The New-England Canaan?
+2/+6 percentiles

24 weeks

What is the suggested spells for English, by Theophilus Wenn?

Annotations by Rev. Phillips in his personal copy reveal Call/Dismiss Ithaka (Ithaqua), Contact Deity/Narlato (Nyarlathotep), Contact Deity/Sadogowah (Tsathoggua), Contact Deity/Yogge Sothyothe (Yog-Sothoth), Elder Sign.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the suggested study period for English, by Theophilus Wenn?
24 weeks
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the suggested spells for True Magick?

Suggested Spells: none, but annotations by Rev. Phillips in his personal copy reveal Call/Dismiss Ithaka (Ithaqua), Contact Deity/Narlato (Nyarlathotep), Contact Deity/Sadogowah (Tsathoggua), Contact Deity/Yogge Sothyothe (Yog-Sothoth), Elder Sign.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the suggested spells for English, by Theophilus Wenn?

Suggested Spells: Call for Spirit of the Air (Summon/Bind Star Vampire), Call Forth the One (Summon/Bind Servitor of the Outer Gods), Call Forth the Winged One (Summon/Bind Byakhee), Speak with the Dark One (Contact Deity/Nyogtha).
You are a helpful AI assistant.

8 weeks
